# robots.txt for Infinity Cards Blog
# This file is generated dynamically via app/robots.ts
# Static fallback for compatibility

User-agent: *
Allow: /
Disallow: /api/
Disallow: /admin/
Disallow: /_next/

# Block AI crawlers from training on our content
User-agent: GPTBot
Disallow: /

User-agent: ChatGPT-User
Disallow: /

# Sitemap
Sitemap: https://infinitycards.com/sitemap.xml
